predicate.note: Frames file for 'resent' based on sentence in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class resent 31.2, no mention of other members. Comparison with 'like'.

roleset.name: resent

example.name: sentential resention
example.text: Corporate executives resent that their company's stock has been transformed into a nameless piece of a stock-index basket.
example.arg: their company's stock has been transformed into a nameless piece of a stock-index basket

example.name: with purpose
example.text: John resents Mary for her perfect grade-point average.

roleset.note: Note that args 1 and 2 can easily be merged: "John resent's Mary's perfect GPA." This is why the reason for resentment deserves to be a full-fledged Arg rather than an ArgM-PRP.
